summary: Puts a fence around part of Windstad manor to protect your possessions. Fits ALL houses.
descriptionHtml:
You want a home fit for a king? Well don't look here. This is a lore friendly mod for Windstad Manor that puts a fence around the front, with a gate, to stop things killing your steward/wife/horse/chickens/cow and moves your beloved possessions such as your cart nearer to the front door. Simple really.  

So added:
third stable pen thing (no scripting) 
Cart station (cart moved)
Fence that runs from the garden to the animal pen. YOU MUST HAVE PURCHASED BOTH OF THESE FOR THIS MOD TO WORK
Two leantos
Gate you can open and close, as a gate should. 

You want to mod it, great, knock yourself out. I think it could use some scripting in places. 

DOWNLOAD INFO:
There is a RAR file for you to download.

OR there is a self extracting file so you don't need to unzip it using an unzip program. Download it, click the file and specify where you want to extract the file to. Then it will self extract the file.
author: rikna
